title: Bug 6304 cannot sync a .java file and another resource
OB: When a .java file and another resource (e.g., .properties file) are selected in the package viewer, the context menu does not have the 'Team' entry.
EB: The 'Team' entry should be available in the context menu when a .java file and another resource are selected in the package viewer.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., .properties file) in the package viewer. 2. Open the context menu and observe that the 'Team' entry is not present.
